data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cruz, Estevam L., Silva, Da, Lise, Arno A. (2011): The Neotropical spider genus Paradossenus (Araneae, Trechaleidae): a new species, taxonomic notes and new records. Zootaxa 2781: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203406
